sub-flow.name: ems-get-employees

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { employeeID: payload01.EMPLOYEEID, employeeName: payload01.EMPLOYEENAME, deptName:payload01.DEPTNAME, salary:payload01.SALARY > 5000 }) orderBy $.salary
